thread.title: Jennifer Ferguson
thread.title_full: Optical Express | Laser Eye Surgery reviewed by Jennifer Ferguson

author: Jennifer Ferguson
title: Jennifer Ferguson
text:
After being very short sighted for over fifty years I decided to have lens replacement surgery. It has been one of the best decisions I ever made. Right from the beginning the team at Optical Express was professional and friendly. Everything was explained to me beforehand so I knew exactly what would happen. Now, just over a week on, I have perfect vision.
I'm so happy that I no longer need the contact lenses which were becoming uncomfortable due to my age.
I would thoroughly recommend this company as my care and aftercare has been excellent and the difference to my life is amazing!
